CacheStorageMatch.summary:
The match() method of the interface checks if a given or URL string is a key for a stored .
This method returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} for a , or a {{jsxref("Promise")}} which resolves to undefined if no match is found.

remarks.para:
You can access CacheStorage through the global
property.
Cache objects are searched in creation order.

blockquote.para:
Note: is a convenience method.
Equivalent functionality is to call on each cache (in the order returned by ) until a is returned.

CacheStorageMatch.returns:
a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to the matching . If
no matching response to the specified request is found, the promise resolves
with undefined.
